price: 27. (Jethro - Shucayb) wuxuu yidhi: Waxaan rabaa inaa kuu guuriyo mid ka mid ah labadaydaan gabdhood, waxaase shardi ah inaad ii shaqeyso siddeed sano, haddiise aad buuxiso toban, waxay ahaan (axsaan) xaggaaga ah, ma doonayo inaan ku dhibo. Haddii Alle idmo, waxaad heli (igu ogaan) inaan ka mid ahay kuwa wanaagsan.
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُنكِحَكَ إِحۡدَى ٱبۡنَتَيَّ هَٰتَيۡنِ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَأۡجُرَنِي ثَمَٰنِيَ حِجَجٖۖ فَإِنۡ أَتۡمَمۡتَ عَشۡرٗا فَمِنۡ عِندِكَۖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أَشُقَّ عَلَيۡكَۚ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla innī urīdu an unkiḥaka iḥ'dā ib'natayya hātayni ʿalā an tajuranī thamāniya ḥijajin fa-in atmamta ʿashran famin ʿindika wamā urīdu an ashuqqa ʿalayka satajidunī in shāa al-lahu mina al-ṣāliḥīna
